entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
